text: [Music]
hello I'm Dylan a cloud engineer here at
the AWS office in cap town today I'm
going to show you how to add or update
billing contact information for your AWS
account I'll be showing you two methods
method one the standard method to add or
update billing contact information for
AWS customers regardless of their
payment preferences like paying by
invoice method two is specifically for
AWS customers that have selected the
payment preference of paying by invoice
let's get
started log the AWS Management console
with your root user credentials or an
AWS identity and access management user
that has the proper permissions to
access the billing
console in the console navigate to the
billing and cost
management from the navigation pane on
the left choose payment preferences
under the default payment preferences
section choose edit next to the default
billing address in the edit billing
address window scroll down to the
billing contact email section to add a
new billing contact email choose add new
email click into the text box containing
the email address you want to
modify make your changes and then choose
save
changes repeat this step to add any
additional billing contact emails that
you might need every email address that
you include here as a billing contact
will receive monthly invoices billing
statements and payment notifications
from
AWS it's a best practice that you
configure IIM user access for managing
billing contacts because you can
bookmark this page and then share it
with that user so that they can
periodically review and update that
contact list another option to update
your billing contact information is to
modify this directly from your account
settings consult
to navigate there click on your account
name in the top right corner select
account scroll down to the alternate
contact Section click on the add button
under the billing contact fill out the
details of your intended contact and
click save when you're
done so now you know how to add or
update billing contact information for
your AWS
account thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us at AWS
yes
[Music]
